kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.msg: Set timeout to: 40000
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: Dado que o cliente esteja na tela inicial da aplicação
Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector //a[@class='login'] at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: E acessar a tela de login
Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//a[@class='login']'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: E acessar a tela de cadastro
Email
kw.msg: ${NOVO_EMAIL} = dmendonca@example.net

kw.name: Type Text
kw.msg: Types the text 'dmendonca@example.net' in the given field.
kw.doc: Types the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element 'button#SubmitCreate'.
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: E preencher o formulário com dados válidos
Click
kw.msg: Clicks the element '//input[@type='radio' and @name='id_gender' and @id='id_gender1']'.
